sentences.en: He felt homesick, but made a brave attempt to appear cheerful.
sentences.cn: 他很想家，但却竭力表现得很高兴。

sentences.en: He was so homesick that he could hardly endure the misery of it.
sentences.cn: 他非常想家，几乎不能忍受这种痛苦。

sentences.en: After the first few weeks abroad, many students will feel a little homesick.
sentences.cn: 在国外的头几周过后，许多学生都会有点想家。
